programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Jordan: Nature's Furnace

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Galapagos: Darwin's Eden
programme.desc: The Galapagos archipelago contains 13 main islands and a hundred or so smaller rocks and reefs. The region's wilderness is so pristine and rich in life. / Lying like a teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Cambodia: The Water Kingdom

programme.title: Redemption

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Special presentation of the 2005 documentary Back from the Dead ft Ian Roussel building a 1954 Chevy

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.

programme.title: Andromeda: Waking the Tyrant's Device
programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Seeking Siegfried
programme.desc: Katikati man Siegfried Newman disappeared on February 25, 2008, after he had dropped his sons Thomas, 9, and Oliver, 7, at Pahoia School. Police carried out a three-day search but found no sign of him.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Evil Heart: The Murder of Donna Wheeler
programme.desc: The bloodied, semi-naked body of 30-year-old Donna Wheeler is discovered by her estranged husband Keith Bond and 12-year-old son.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Kiss Of Death
programme.desc: Stevie's one night stand with Leo leads to Drovers losing its organic status as he takes revenge by spraying the land with chemicals. Jodi learns Rob's secret - he is on witness protection - bringing them closer together.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Luck By A Lady
programme.desc: Stevie literally gambles everything to save Drovers Run from being possessed by the bank. Hoping to impress Harry and ensure his ownership of Drovers Run, Sandra gazumps Tess's lamb sale.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Real McLeod
programme.desc: When evidence mounts against Stevie, Kate starts to believe that she could be guilty of Harry Ryan’s murder. Riley reacts badly when a local trainer is revealed to be abusing his horses.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Calling
programme.desc: After a series of confusing dreams and visions, Tess learns that Nick is alive. Kate discovers she may have skin cancer - and hides it from her friends. Moira questions her psychic ability, frustrated by its fickleness.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick returns, troubled by flashbacks of his mugging in Argentina. B STORY: Kate heads to Adelaide to see the cancer specialist. Jodi follows her, supporting Kate through the terror of discovering she has cancer.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Where the Heart is
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick's unhappiness leads to Tess deciding to return to Argentina with him - after receiving a 'sign' that Drovers Run supports her leaving. B STORY: A brumby stallion lures Phoenix back the wild.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted Town
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS investigates the entire town of Alexandria, Louisiana, where paranormal activity seems to lurk around every corner.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Empire State Haunt
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Taps heads to Fort William Henry located in Lake George, New York, where Ghost Hunters Academy winner Adam Berry joins the team.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Coroner's Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Shreveport, Louisiana where the employees and owner of the Rendall Building are experiencing terrifying paranormal activity.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Urgent!
programme.desc: We pick were we last left off, in Hawaii, for the reveal. Jason and Grant were called back for a very important personal case, the Reid House, in Rhode Island, to help a scared 4 year old.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Drug Wars: ISIS Invades
programme.desc: Mindanao, Philippines is home to the largest Muslim community in the country. Suddenly, an ISIS flag is raised in the city of Marawi as jihadist militants try to take control of the region.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Barbarians At The Gate
programme.desc: Philippine President Duterte has declared war on illegal drugs, but the battle now gets more complicated. In the Muslim-heavy southern regions of the country, ISIS begins to profit off large scale drug trafficking

programme.title: Drug Wars: Morocco Express
programme.desc: Spain has become the gateway for drugs entering Europe, as traffickers take advantage of the proximity between Morocco and Spain. Today, Moroccan hashish is in full harvest and ready for distribution.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Gibraltar Connection
programme.desc: In southern Spain, the port of Algeciras has long served as a major point of entry for European goods. This iconic trading post is now being used as a backdoor to Europe’s major drug markets.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Rise of the Cartel
programme.desc: This season Drug Wars returns to the US, where along the Rio Grande the battle rages between Mexican cartels and the US Border Patrol.

programme.title: Drug Wars: A River Runs Through This
programme.desc: In Texas the Rio Grande is all that separates the US from Mexico. The Border Patrol Riverine Unit’s mission is to guard these waters and their job is getting harder and harder,

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Race is On
programme.desc: In Texas deadly high speed chases are a frequent occurrence between officers of the US Border Patrol and cartel smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Drug Store Cartels
programme.desc: In Mexico cartels are increasingly turning to the manufacture of prescription drugs, including lab-produced methamphetamines and opioids.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Grave Danger
programme.desc: The Rio Grande City Border Patrol pursues suspects ranging from cartel coyotes and gang members to families escaping persecution back home.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Every Dog Has Its Day
programme.desc: Border Patrol K9 units are highly trained at detecting illicit drugs and human traffic victims, and are key members of US efforts along the border.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Waiting Game
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Knife Week
programme.desc: While Froy waits on news from his lawyer about his warrant in Texas, he considers taking matters into his own hands. Lou and Froy bust some slick moves in an attempt to wrangle a car from a debtor who is prepared to battle. Then, when one woman behaves...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Think, Adapt and Attack
programme.desc: Matt and Froy head to Texas to clear Froy's name, but things take a turn for the worse and Froy finds himself in more trouble than he can handle. Back in LA, Lou and Lyndah repo a car from a deceptive charity worker, and Lou is left to protect...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Cement Mixer
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah, and Sonia fight not only with them but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mess with Texas
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adapt, Improvise, and Overcome
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Revelations
programme.desc: Andi's suspicions are raised concerning her lover. Sabrina and Calvin start to make progress. Danni still has a chip on her shoulder, but sets it aside in favour of helping Andi. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The Game: Just The Three Of Us
programme.desc: Melanie feels jealous after Derwin goes with Janay to her first pregnancy appointment.

programme.title: The Game: A Delectable Basket Of Treats
programme.desc: Tasha boycotts Malik's marriage to Robin Givens, fearing that their marriage is a scam.

programme.title: The Game: The Platski Thickens
programme.desc: Kelly catches Jason with another woman after they each agree to move on from one another.

programme.title: The Game: White Coat And White Lies
programme.desc: Melanie reluctantly turns to her parents for financial help when she learns that her grant money to cover for her tuition has been revoked and she has been placed on academic probation.

programme.title: The Game: The Side Part, Under Episode
programme.desc: Melanie meets her very own Dr. McHottie at the hospital where she is a first year resident.

programme.title: The Game: Oh, What A Night
programme.desc: Tasha, being insecure, worries that her relationship with Rick Fox has no future, so she starts playing the field.

programme.title: The Game: The Negotiation Episode
programme.desc: Derwin helps Jason try to win Kelly back, putting an end to all divorce talk, but then things go not as planned.

programme.title: The Game: Insert Car Here
programme.desc: Jason loses his mind when he finds Kelly on a date with another man named Joe, in the car he gave her for a gift.

programme.title: The Game: Stay Fierce, Malik
programme.desc: During an exclusive interview with Extra's Tanika Ray whatever, Robin Givens insinuates that Malik is gay, and for that reason, he wants to break up with her.

programme.title: Run's House: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela are in desperate need of money to decorate their apartment.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fire
programme.desc: Christina has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since her father and step-mother were murdered near Columbus, OH last year. PRS and psychic/medium?Chip Coffey delve into a open murder case and wind up exposing a family divide.

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to film at Ashwell Prison after being pushed to the limits tempers fray and Yvette is stuck alone, petrified as she is stalked by an unseen force lost in the corridors of the prison and the team scramble to save her

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 1
programme.desc: Yvette and the MH team travel to the oldest pub in Macclesfield, famous for ghost stories and strange occurrences. Whatever is there makes itself known quickly and violently.

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to investigate Macclesfield’s oldest pub and are soon under fire from poltergeist activity. Glen’s scepticism is put fully to the test.

programme.title: Ruthin Pt 1
programme.desc: This old Welsh Castle pushes Yvette’s team of ghost hunters to the limit and at least one of them doesn’t make it to the end…but who? Strange noises and sinister shadows seem to create an atmosphere of foreboding throughout the night.

programme.title: Ruthin Pt 2

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Weary of evading their relentless Cylon pursuers, the Galactica crew, led by Apollo and Starbuck, decides to take on a Cylon base star in a fight to the death.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: Tony married Tracy in June 2013, six months after meeting her on a dating site. Tracy started to physically and verbally abuse Tony less than a year into the marriage. She was jailed for two years at Canterbury Crown Court in October 2019.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: Aged just 17, Kayleigh was knifed in the back by a stranger in Yeovil, Somerset, in June 2015 while walking to the house of her best friend, Liv. Kayleigh collapsed, but managed to drag herself to Liv's house, where she begged for help.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: Sammy was 14 when she met Arshid Hussain in 1999. Hussain was the leader of a sex ring and was jailed for 35 years in 2016 for 23 offences involving nine women. Sammy finally got away from Hussain when he was imprisoned in 2001 for a violent offence.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: At the age of three, Christopher was placed in the care of Eunice Spry, a pillar of the Jehovah's Witness community in Gloucestershire. For over 13 years Eunice systematically tortured Christopher and some of her other foster children.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Extreme Animals
programme.desc: Extreme Animals features environments hostile to humans, but havens to many animals. Witness gorgeous glow-worms, high flying condors, parched thorny devils, emperor penguins, and polar bears in this journey through life on the edge.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Land Adventures
programme.desc: Most land adventures come with some risk - a chance to confront our deepest fears, resist the pull of the ordinary, and soar into the wild unknown.

programme.title: Arthur: All About D.W./Blockheads
programme.desc: When Emily gets the starring role in the preschool play, D.W. is beside herself with jealousy. She should be Little Red Riding Hood, not Tree #2! Then, D.W. and Emily are upset when they get stuck with the blocks at playtime.

programme.title: Arthur: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.desc: Alberto Molina's beloved soccer ball--signed by his favorite Ecuadorian soccer star --is lost! While on vacation, Buster discovers a message in a bottle on the shore. Could it be a message from the people of the lost city of Atlantis?

programme.title: Arthur: Background Blues/And Now Let's Talk To Some Kids
programme.desc: Wouldn't it be cool to find out that your ancestors were famous frontier explorers? But what if they were just...plain folks? The Magic Toolbox show is coming to Ratburn's class to put the kids on TV!

programme.title: Arthur: Swept Away/Germophobia
programme.desc: Arthur, D.W. and Buster are spending a few days at the beach. Can they save their sandcastle from the ocean tides? Buster's friends have had enough of his sloppy habits, so they band together to educate him on the realities of bacteria.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Pet Business/D.W. The Copycat
programme.desc: How can Arthur prove to his parents that he's responsible enough to take care of his very own puppy? "Get a job," suggests D.W.!. Yet another personality change for D.W., who's decided that from now on, she'll be just like Arthur.

programme.title: Arthur: The Lousy Week/You Are Arthur
programme.desc: An army of lice has descended on the heads of Lakewood Elementary. Who or what is strong enough to defeat them? What if you could be Arthur for a day? View Arthur's life through his very own eyes for this special episode.

programme.title: Arthur: Desert Island Dish/The Secret About Secrets
programme.desc: When Mr. Ratburn challenges the class to find the perfect food for surviving on a desert island, everyone picks potato chips or ice cream! D.W. is told a secret and quickly learns that keeping one is a lot harder than she thought.

programme.title: Arthur: Molina's Mulligan/Buster Bombs
programme.desc: Alberto discovers he has a natural talent for golf and begins to compete, but will his dad's embarrassing cheers make him give it up? Buster has lost his flair for funny, and the harder he tries to make people laugh, the worse it gets.

programme.title: Arthur: The Last Day (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: It's a time of change at Lakewood Elementary as Arthur and Buster move up to 4th grade. D.W. and Bud prepare to enter kindergarten and Muffy and Francine contemplate how spending the summer away from each other will affect their friendship.

programme.title: Field of Valor
programme.desc: It was becoming clear in 1939 that direct U.S. involvement in World War Two was only a matter of time. Training approximately 500 to 750 pilots a year, the United States Army Air Corps was severely outmatched by the warring powers of Europe and Asia.

programme.title: Gestapo: Hitler's Secret Police
programme.desc: Hermann Goering’s Secret State Police were tasked to arrest and torture confessions and information from supposed enemies of the Reich.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: This first part of the series introduces the first tanks being deployed on the battlefields in northern France during WWI and describes the devastating effect these steel monsters had on an infantry confronted with them for the very first time.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The second episode starts on the morning of the 22nd of June 1941 when the Germans launched operation Barbarossa, the code name for the invasion of the Soviet Union.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The third episode opens with Rommel’s second offensive in North Africa.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love is for real. Nev investigates to reveal a shocking Catfish.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari
programme.desc: Jamey fell for Ari online, and he will do anything to meet her, but she will only do it on TV! Nev and Max help Ari share her story, and she hopes Jamey will accept her as she is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jarrod & Abby
programme.desc: How do young people who've embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others they've never met in person before. The problem -- that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jasmine & Mike
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Jaylin is prepared to sacrifice a lifelong friendship and promising videogame career to be with a woman he's never even spoken to on the phone. (S5, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Mama doesn't always know best. Shuntay enlists the help of Nev and Max after her mum begins talking about marriage and uprooting her family to be with a man who refuses to meet in person. (S5, ep2)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Umm, Hello
programme.desc: It's boys weekend, and the girls are headed home to see their loved ones. With the girls away, Pauly decides to invite their old roommate, Angelina, to Miami.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: A Sea Of Tears
programme.desc: The villa reaches breaking point with the arrival of not one but three Exes, causing chaos for lovebirds Ross and Harriette. Meanwhile Zahida's Ex, Joe, spirals out of control.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Harriette's Love Triangle
programme.desc: The misery continues for the singles as Sean moves from Zahida to Zaralena, and Harriette's love triangle deepens. Maisie's desperate for action and a Geordie makes a spectacular entrance.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Nicole's Nightmare
programme.desc: The tension in the villa reaches boiling point as Zaralena feels the force of Zahida's rage. Josh has his eye on Nicole, but will it be game over when she discovers a devastating secret?

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: The Blonde Bombshell
programme.desc: Adam reveals his feelings for Nicole, while Jack and Josh hope for fresh blood in the villa. Zaralena grows closer to Aaron, and Ross and Harriette finally spend a night in the penthouse.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Harriette's Heartache
programme.desc: The tablet of terror tops up the torment for Becca, and there's even more heartache for Harriette. Zaralena's misery continues but it's the latest Ex who threatens to unleash havoc.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 focuses on the role of the Canadian Mounted Police in the investigation and sting operation put in place to obtain confessions from Rafay and Burns. Having taken refuge in Canada, Rafay and Burns were extradited to Seattle to face murder charges.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: A report about the crimes of the Sun Gym gang, a group of Miami, Florida drifters, petty thieves, and bodybuilders who kidnapped and killed wealthy people to fuel their lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ron Rudin, a wealthy real-estate developer disappeared from his home in Las Vegas, Nev. Later, the charred remains of his decapitated body were found in the desert. After a lengthy investigation police were convinced that Rudin’s wife was involved.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Hamptons
programme.desc: A report on the October 2001 murder of Wall Street tycoon Ted Ammon who was embroiled in a bitter divorce battle with his wife Generosa who later died of breast cancer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Bad Bet
programme.desc: A bookie comes under suspicion when his wife is killed.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Trial
programme.desc: Josef Varsh plans to put an American on trial on false charges, discredit the West, and gain power.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Carriers
programme.desc: Enemy agent Janos Passik is preparing to train 200 foreign agents to infiltrate the U.S. and engage in some form of bacteriological warfare.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Short Tail Spy
programme.desc: A defector has been targeted by two rival groups from the same foreign country. The team is to discredit the younger group, so that the U.S. can more easily handle the old-line group.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Legacy
programme.desc: The IMF must get hold of a hoard of Nazi gold through four young men, sons of Hitler's top aides, who are sent to Switzerland to meet for the first time and pool their parts of the "puzzle" together.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Reluctant Dragon
programme.desc: Dr. Cherlotov, a scientist of an enemy power, failed to defect to the West when his wife did. Now that he has developed a cheap, effective anti-ballistic system, the IMF is ordered to get him out.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Look What I Can Do
programme.desc: Barney's friends are playing a fun game of "I Can Do" where they each share something they can do. When BJ suggests having an "I Can Do" show, Baby Bop becomes worried.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The Park Kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets. A rainy day has everyone stuck in the Caboose. Barney suggests fun activities.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Stop! Go!
programme.desc: After playing with "Stop" and "Go" signs with Angela, Baby Bop leaves to direct some traffic of her own! Meanwhile, in the caboose, Barney and the kids enjoy a costume parade, a game of "Musical Stop & Go," and some very vigorous body movement.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Mr. Boyd prepare his dog Bingo for a trip to the veterinarian for a check, while learning lessons about caring for dogs at the same time. Meanwhile, BJ is searching for his missing baseball, which he suspects was buried by Bingo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All Aboard
programme.desc: Kami, one of Barney's youngest friends, has trouble keeping up with the other kids and she's tired of always being last. She's not having a very good day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop thinks the half-moon is somehow broken, Barney and Friends take an imaginary visit to the moon where Barney eases her concerns.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Making a Move
programme.desc: Welcome to the neighborhood! Anna has just moved to the neighborhood and is missing her old friends. Barney and his friends help her discover that moving is an adventure with new places to explore and new friends to meet.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Gift Of The Dinos - Winter
programme.desc: It's Christmas and BJ dreams of getting a new baseball glove to go with his baseball, while Riff hopes for new drumsticks to use his drum. Barney reminds them that Christmas is more than just getting gifts and helps them learn the meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Up, Down, and Around!
programme.desc: When Tony brings his kite to the park to show his friends, it accidentally blows into the branches of a tree! While waiting for a breeze to blow the kite down, Barney, Baby Bop and the kids play games about "up" and "down."

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hook, Line & Printer
programme.desc: A last-minute auction in Norwalk proves challenging when Ton and Allen go toe-to-toe with a real life cowboy couple. When the dust settles, the guys uncover a 3D printer and a grappling hook gun they can't wait to shoot.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Space Cowboys
programme.desc: With the pawn shop history, Ton and Allen start the next chapter of their careers with a bang. They uncover an antique WWII firearm and a Russian cosmonaut space suit, which could be their biggest find to date...if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Machine Gun Ton
programme.desc: Ton and Allen battle a pair of vicious female auction hunters who have an axe to grind and bid based on spite rather than strategy. And a gatling gun & suit of armor are worth much less than the guys expected.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Got Served
programme.desc: After a crushing defeat, the guys leave an auction empty handed and scramble to find new merchandise at a yard sale. But questionable antique tennis rackets and an ancient special effects box may not earn them a cent.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Tough as Nails
programme.desc: CJ seeks to disrupt Allen's search for serenity at a storage auction before the guy's head to a live auction to buy and sell. They uncover an unusual Marilyn Monroe statue, an industrial slip n' slide, and a bed of nails.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: To Pawn or Not To Pawn
programme.desc: On the brink of a major decision, Ton and Allen face-off with Carolyn at an auction in Covina. They win a "special effects unit" that contains big machines for crazy stunt work. The guys decide the fate of the shop.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton-Geons & Dragons
programme.desc: While Ton soups up their new truck, Allen heads to an auction solo and encounters Carolyn and CJ. There he discovers LARP weaponry, a sword collection, and falconry gear, before Ton reveals their new ride: Betty.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Sis Ducks Out
programme.desc: Big Sis drops some bad news as the guys clash with Carolyn over a carnival unit at an auction in Long Beach. Ton and Allen unearth a Native American tomahawk, a dunk tank and a rare gun that can fire three shots at once.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cheyenne shocks Cory with her pregnancy news. Amber struggles when her dog's health deteriorates and Catelynn and Tyler are concerned that Nova might have a learning disability. (S9, ep9)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: As Maci copes with the aftermath of the shooting, Cheyenne uses her platform to discuss racial injustice. Mackenzie's friends visit her in Florida and question her rekindled marriage. (S9, ep10)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cheyenne is nervous for the results of Zach's genetic test that will determine whether their unborn child will have VLCAD. After not going to Leah's party, Amber tries to make amends. (S9, ep11)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Cheyenne and Zach have a gender reveal party and finally get the results of Zach's genetic test. Maci is shocked to learn that Ryan had a session with Bentley's therapist. (S9, ep12)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Catelynn and Tyler find out the gender of their baby with an at-home test. Mackenzie goes home to Oklahoma to surprise her dad and finds out he's still struggling with depression. (S9, ep15)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Heading into her 3rd trimester, Cheyenne needs Cory to help out more with Ryder but he has other plans. Catelynn is hesitant but Tyler wants to try ketamine therapy. (S9, ep16)

programme.title: CSI: New York: Where There's Smoke…
programme.desc: The CSI New York team rushes to stop serial arsonist Leonard Brooks after he begins using fire against people from his dark past.

programme.title: CSI: New York: 2,918 Miles
programme.desc: Evidence found in photos at a crime scene on the Brooklyn Bridge sends Mac and Jo to San Francisco in search of a missing teenage girl.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Unspoken
programme.desc: The CSI New York team of investigators race to catch a shooter when Lindsay is injured during the attempted murder of a political candidate.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Misconceptions
programme.desc: Mac investigates a 20-year-old case involving a missing boy when the prime suspect is found murdered on the anniversary of the boy’s disappearance.

programme.title: CSI: New York: The Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate a twisted fairy tale when a woman in a ball gown is found at the bottom of the pond outside Belvedere Castle in Central Park.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Mommie Deadest
programme.desc: When a suburban soccer mom is murdered, the CSIs uncover her family's dark past, while Delko continues his undercover mission.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Tire Bomb
programme.desc: When Horatio Caine's ex-girlfriend is killed in an explosion, the team looks within their own department to find the killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: All Fall Down
programme.desc: A serial killer taunts the CSIs by leaving them cryptic hints, and the longer it takes them to decode these puzzles, the higher the death toll rises.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Fallen
programme.desc: The CSI team suffers the tragic loss of one of their own when a psychotic genius runs wild in otherwise beautiful Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Sudden Death
programme.desc: When a bottle girl is murdered at an exclusive club, Horatio must search through Miami's most elite guest list to find her killer.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Fire And Ice
programme.desc: A woman’s body is found in a burning car. As the smoke settles, police arrive and find an abandoned car seat in the back seat. Investigators are frantic to find the child.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Devil’s Den
programme.desc: Baffled by the animal instincts of a cross country killer whose crimes seem to go dormant in winter, authorities ultimately follow his tracks to a den of deceit in the frozen tundra of Alaska.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Carthage
programme.desc: Widow Marjorie Nugent was a recluse renown to nearly everyone in Carthage. So much so, that when she vanished in 1997, no one seemed to notice.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Ocean City
programme.desc: In 2002, Erika and BJ Sifrit’s vacation ended with them arrested for robbery. When two dismembered bodies were later unearthed, the connection would reveal a chance encounter that led to murder.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Somerset
programme.desc: In 2002, Somerset native, Sam Catron, was running for his fifth consecutive term as County Sheriff until an assassin’s bullet struck him dead at a local political rally.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lindsey Gets High Episode
programme.desc: Former child star Todd Bridges guides Lindsey on a wild odyssey to teach her the dangers of drug use. Ice Cube, Charlie Murphy and Jerry Springer also guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Liar, Liar Episode

programme.desc: After receiving a terrible blow on the head, Grizzy thinks he's a rodent and tries to get the gang to adopt him.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the ranger's console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his kart racing game.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Emancipation
programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: A joint Doors International/Taelon venture creates a machine that allows people to vividly relive a memory, but Liam suspects a back alley version of the device is leading to the death of some users.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Once and Future World
programme.desc: Artifacts believed to be Taelon are found in South America. Renee and Liam try to beat Sandoval to the source to determine the importance of the found pieces.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Thicker than Blood
programme.desc: An old business partner of Augur's is hired by Da'an to get information about the Resistance, resulting in the death of many members. Meanwhile, Sandoval finds out he has a life threatening blood disorder.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: Liam and Renee investigate a dead pregnant woman missing her fetus. They discover a town that Da'an helped after a nuclear meltdown and a suspicious brother and sister who were part of an early experiment to combine human and Taelon DNA.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar
programme.desc: Pad'ar is a fierce battle game where spectators can connect via a "jack patch" that Liam suspects is causing neurological damage to users. When a Pad'ar warrior dies, it raises even more questions about the safety.

programme.title: The Lost World: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Challenger comes face to face with an old friend from England, Dr. William Hargrove. Summerlee, Malone, and Marguerite agree to help the Queen of the nymphs and fairies break a curse.

programme.title: The Lost World: Time After Time
programme.desc: While hunting, Roxton and Veronica come across two individuals from the future. One becomes keen on using Marguerite to lead him to riches, and the other is set on stopping that from happening.

programme.title: The Lost World: Prodigal Father
programme.desc: The explorers find trouble when they help save and aid a man they believe is Veronica's long lost father on the run from Kartas, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: Birthright
programme.desc: Summerlee, Roxton, and Veronica must outrun a T-rex that's tracking them for dinner. Meanwhile Marguerite, Malone, and Challenger are manipulated by Ramses to help him take his place as pharaoh.

programme.title: The Lost World: Resurrection
programme.desc: Malone and Veronica must defend the treehouse from mercenaries. After being ambushed by Norse warriors, Roxton must take the life of another in order to rise from the dead and save Marguerite.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Chosen One
programme.desc: Roxton is determined to help the chosen one find his way back to the elders and save the star of hope. Veronica and the others worry when Malone begins spending time with a strange women.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Former MP and health minister Edwina Currie goes up against journalist Eve Pollard on a trip around Liverpool and Manchester. Paired with Paul Laidlaw and David Harper, Edwina goes underground and Eve sees a different side to woman's lib.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's Weatherfield versus Walford, as Shaun Williamson takes on Vicky Entwistle. In a stunning TVR Chimera, with Paul Laidlaw and Mark Stacy, they're looking to see who can turn the biggest profit at auction.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Globe-trotting Judith Chalmers takes on son Mark Durden-Smith. With a couple of guides--Paul Laidlaw and James Lewis--they visit Worcestershire and Gloucestershire, sorting the tourist tat from treasure in their racy 1970s TR6.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Miles Jupp and Nina Wadia join Thomas Plant and Catherine Southon in Berkshire and Buckinghamshire. Miles discovers Buckinghamshire's chair domination and Nina hears about a group of WWII heroes. All auction proceeds go to Children in Need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Supermodel Jodie Kidd and chef James Martin are raring to go in Sussex in a pair of Jaguar E types as they race to find antiques for auction. Riding shotgun are Philip Serrell and David Harper to help get them to the finish line in Lewes.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: It's never a quiet life for our teen mums. Sassi plasters over the cracks, Megan prepares for her big day, Amber's love life is in tatters, Chloe buys a house and the all-new Mia is here! (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Labour And Love
programme.desc: More tears, tiffs and true love in Teen Mom UK. Megan has a baby, Amber has a meltdown, and romance is in the air for Mia. Sassi celebrates her 1st Mother's Day and Chloe tackles her weight. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Lads Trip

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Making Memories

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Now Or Never

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Mistake
programme.desc: Explores the issue of young women who conceive children and hide the pregnancy. They secretly give birth and then abandon the baby, some claiming that their babies were born dead.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Full Moon
programme.desc: In August 1996, Yvette Rodier and Zach Snarr went to the mountains for their date to take photos of the full moon, when a stranger drove up, pulled out a gun and opened fire. Zach was killed. Yvette, shot four times, survived by pretending to be dead.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: Dr. Richard Illes, a heart surgeon, and his wife, Miriam, were a prominent couple in Williamsport, PA. Then, on Jan. 15, 1999, Miriam was fatally shot as she stood in front of her kitchen window. Investigators think that Richard was responsible.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Mystery in Room 813
programme.desc: On November 13, 1996, at a Sheraton hotel east of Los Angeles, 27-year-old Sandra Orellana of Houston, on a business trip with her 33-year-old boss Robert Salazar, went over a balcony and met her death.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Their Father, The Godfather
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, and for the first time, three of the children of the late crime boss John Gotti discuss the life they experienced growing up as members of his family, how they were sheltered from an awareness of Gotti’s lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Mansion
programme.desc: In 1976, a gunman dressed in black murders two people and wounds two more in the Texas mansion belonging to one of the victims.

programme.title: Children of the Corn

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic. Director: David Cronenberg Starring: Marilyn Chambers, Frank Moore, Joe Silver

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Lon Chaney Sr. was the original Phantom of the Opera, but there have been other notable portrayals  and other notable phantoms!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Witches have been a favorite of fairy tales  and fright films  for centuries. Heres a wicked look at a covens worth of portrayals.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: A babysitting uncle tells his charges three horror stories - about a killer witch, Little Red Riding Hood and a werewolf, and "Goldi Lox" and the three bears. Starring: Scott Valentine, Nicole Picard, Matt Mitler

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: After a young man is murdered by a road-racing gang of motor-heads, a mysterious fast-driving spirit descends from the sky to take revenge. Starring: Charlie Sheen, Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Randy Quaid, Matthew Barry

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: A true horror cult classic! A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening. Starring: Michelle Michaels, Robin Stille, Michael Villella

programme.title: Halloween Night
programme.desc: Halloween Night, 1982, an inmate of a maximum security facility escapes after murdering two guards. Upon returning to the house where he was born, he goes on a killing spree that will make him Southern California's greatest mass murderer.

programme.title: Return to Horror High
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a series of murders occurred at Crippen High. Years later, the now-abandoned site is being used as the set for a film when an uninvited guest begins to terrorize the crew. Starring: George Clooney, Lori Lethin, Brendan Hughes, Alex Rocco

programme.title: Pluto TV Slasher Movies - Daytime Card

programme.title: Rats: Night of Terror
programme.desc: Rats: Night of Terror is a post-apocalyptic pot-boiler sees some of the last humans alive grapple with a horde of flesh-eating rodents - and a shocking final revelation that has fast become director Bruno Mattei's signature 'twist'.

programme.title: Night Harvest
programme.desc: In 1970s Tennessee, teen runaway Nathan, who has pyrokinesis, must confront a killer scarecrow after his group’s RV breaks down—using his powers to survive with the help of a local farmer.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E1 - Season Of Death
programme.desc: D'Argo and Stark try to heal John, left with his head open on an operating table, while Scorpius attempts to avoid discovery.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E2 - Suns And Lovers
programme.desc: Moya docks at a commerce station so the crew can spend some of their money. Disaster strikes when the station is hit by a storm.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E3 - Self Inflicted Wounds, Part 1: Could'a, Would'a, Should'a
programme.desc: Moya approaches a wormhole, gets pulled in and fused to another ship.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E4 - Self Inflicted Wounds, Part 2: Wait For The Wheel
programme.desc: The crew works out a way of getting free from the other ship and out of the wormhole.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E5 - Different Destinations
programme.desc: Stark accidentally sends himself, Crichton, Aeryn. D'Argo and Jool are back in time where they alter the timeline.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E6 - Eat Me
